cause.description:
Oklahoma Shakespeare in the Park is the only full time classic theatre in Oklahoma. The company produces a three play Summer Season at the Jack O'Mearea Amphitheater in Edmond, OK, a Winter Season at Stage Center in Oklahoma City, OK, a Christmas production in Edmond, OK and a statewide touring and artist-in-residence program.
Programs: Summer Season Three Shakespearen productions at E.C. Hafer Park in Edmond. Winter Production A Shakespearen production at at Stage Center in OkC, OK Christmas Show A traditional rendering of A Christmas Carol. Touring A statewide touring program tours schools, community ctrs, Artist In Residence Classroom training in public schools.
